attributes.action: Change the homophobic and transphobic advice on the Governments website changed!
attributes.background: On this Government page https://www.gov.uk/divorce/grounds-for-divorce it states that 'It doesn’t count as adultery if they had sex with someone of the same sex. This includes if you’re in a same-sex marriage.' This is just promoting homophobia and ignores LGBTQ rights. Please sign!!

rejection.details:
We're not sure what action you'd like the Government to take. The advice given explains what the law is at the moment. 

If you'd like the law to be changed, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/167966
